about.title: About Collage.fm
about.subtitle: Create beautiful visual representations of your music taste

whatIs.title: What is Collage.fm?
whatIs.description: Collage.fm is a free web application that lets you create beautiful visual collages based on your Last.fm listening history. Whether you want to showcase your top albums from the past week or your all-time favorite artists, Collage.fm makes it easy to generate and share personalized music grids.

gridSizes.title: Multiple Grid Sizes
gridSizes.description: Choose from 3×3, 4×4, 5×5, or 10×10 grids to showcase your music.

timePeriods.title: Time Period Selection
timePeriods.description: Generate collages based on your listening history from the last week, month, 3 months, 6 months, year, or all time.

downloadOptions.title: Customizable Download Options
downloadOptions.description: Include or exclude titles, play counts, and choose compression quality.

howItWorks.title: How It Works
howItWorks.description: Collage.fm connects to the Last.fm API to fetch your listening data. When you enter your Last.fm username and select your preferences, our application retrieves your top albums or artists for the selected time period, arranges them in a grid, and generates a downloadable image.

username.title: Enter your Last.fm username
username.description: Connect your Last.fm account by providing your username

preferences.title: Select your preferences
preferences.description: Choose between albums or artists, select a time period, and pick a grid size

generate.title: Generate your collage
generate.description: Our app will fetch your data and create your personalized collage

download.title: Download and share
download.description: Download your collage and share it on social media to show off your music taste

technology.title: Technology
technology.description: Collage.fm is built using modern web technologies to ensure a fast, responsive experience:

nextjs.title: Next.js
nextjs.description: React framework for server-side rendering and static site generation

typescript.title: TypeScript
typescript.description: For type-safe code and better developer experience

tailwind.title: Tailwind CSS
tailwind.description: Utility-first CSS framework for responsive design

creator.title: About the Creator
creator.description1: a web developer and music enthusiast. After using similar tools in the past, Rhuan decided to create a modern, user-friendly version with additional features and better performance.
creator.description2: The project is open source and available on GitHub. Contributions, feedback, and feature requests are welcome!

introduction.title: Introduction
introduction.content: Collage.fm is committed to protecting your privacy. This Privacy Policy explains how we collect, use, and safeguard your information when you visit our website.

informationCollect.title: Information We Collect
informationCollect.content: When you use Collage.fm, we collect the following types of information:

username.title: Last.fm Username
username.description: When you generate a collage, we temporarily process your Last.fm username to fetch your music data from Last.fm's API.

usageData.title: Usage Data
usageData.description: We collect anonymous information about how you interact with our website, such as pages visited and time spent on the site.

howWeUse.title: How We Use Your Information
howWeUse.content: We use the information we collect to:
howWeUse.generateCollages: Generate music collages based on your Last.fm listening history
howWeUse.improveWebsite: Improve our website and user experience
howWeUse.analyzeUsage: Analyze usage patterns and optimize performance
howWeUse.noStorage: We do not store your Last.fm username or listening data on our servers after your session ends. All data processing is temporary and used solely to generate your collage.

thirdParty.title: Third-Party Services
thirdParty.content: Collage.fm uses the following third-party services:

lastfmApi.title: Last.fm API
lastfmApi.description: We access the Last.fm API to retrieve your music listening data.

vercel.title: Vercel
vercel.description: Our website is hosted on Vercel, which may collect anonymous usage data and logs.

cookies.title: Cookies and Tracking
cookies.content: Collage.fm uses minimal cookies that are necessary for the website to function properly. These cookies do not track personal information and are used only to enhance your experience.

security.title: Data Security
security.content: We implement appropriate security measures to protect against unauthorized access, alteration, disclosure, or destruction of your information.

rights.title: Your Rights
rights.access: Access the personal information we have about you
rights.correct: Request that we correct or delete any personal information we have about you
rights.object: Object to our processing of your personal information
rights.restrict: Request that we restrict processing of your personal information

changes.title: Changes to This Privacy Policy
changes.content: We may update our Privacy Policy from time to time. We will notify you of any changes by posting the new Privacy Policy on this page.

contact.title: Contact Us
contact.content: If you have any questions about this Privacy Policy, please contact us via GitHub at https://github.com/rhuanbello/collagefm.
